statements: SELECT * FROM patient_medication_usage;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_medication_usage;
SELECT usage_date, medication_name, effectiveness_score FROM patient_medication_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, patient_id FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE dosage > 50;
SELECT patient_id, effectiveness_score FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE effectiveness_score >= 80 ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_medication_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC, effectiveness_score ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE dosage > 50 AND effectiveness_score >= 8 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT medication_name FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, dosage, effectiveness_score FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE medication_name LIKE '%aspirin%' ORDER BY dosage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(dosage) AS max_dosage, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM patient_medication_usage WHERE medication_name = 'ibuprofen';
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1999-12-31'
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN medications ON patients.patient_id = medications.patient_id
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage > 50 ORDER BY medication_name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medication_name, dosage FROM patients JOIN medications ON patients.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE medications.dosage BETWEEN 75 AND 100 ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(medication_id) AS num_medications FROM patients LEFT JOIN medications ON patients.patient_id = medications.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING num_medications > 1 ORDER BY num_medications DESC;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_patient FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth IS NOT NULL GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY oldest_patient ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE medication_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id JOIN medications ON treatments.medication_id = medications.medication_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(treatment_id) AS num_treatments FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';

SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.patient_name, medications.medication_name FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id JOIN medications ON treatments.medication_id = medications.medication_id;
SELECT treatments.patient_id, AVG(treatments.effectiveness_score) AS avg_score FROM treatments GROUP BY treatments.patient_id HAVING AVG(treatments.effectiveness_score) > 7;

SELECT patients.patient_id, COUNT(treatments.treatment_id) AS num_treatments FROM patients LEFT JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id GROUP BY patients.patient_id ORDER BY num_treatments DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM Medications ORDER BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_name, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, gender, phone_number FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';

SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id JOIN Medications ON Treatments.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
SELECT treatment_id, patient_name, start_date, end_date FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT treatment_id, medication_name, frequency, effectiveness_score FROM Medications JOIN Treatments ON Medications.medication_id = Treatments.medication_id JOIN Effectiveness ON Treatments.treatment_id = Effectiveness.treatment_id WHERE effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM Medications WHERE side_effects IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, feedback FROM Patients JOIN EffectivenessTracking ON Patients.patient_id = EffectivenessTracking.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, side_effects FROM Medications;
SELECT treatment_name, cost, start_date, end_date FROM Treatments;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage_taken, timestamp FROM Patients JOIN UsageTracking ON Patients.patient_id = UsageTracking.patient_id JOIN Medications ON UsageTracking.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, effectiveness_score, feedback FROM Patients JOIN EffectivenessTracking ON Patients.patient_id = EffectivenessTracking.patient_id JOIN Medications ON EffectivenessTracking.medication_id = Medications.medication_id;
